description: If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to create invoices manually from the sale invoices menu.
If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to create orders manually from the sale orders menu.
If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to create sale delivery notes manually from the sale delivery notes menu.
If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to create purchase delivery notes manually from the purchase delivery notes menu.
This group will not be able to create new products manually in the web.
This group will not be able to modify fields in the products, or delete products, in the web.
If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to create complex/normal manufacturing orders.
This group will not be able to create new products in the web using the product generator.
If this permission is given to a group, none of this group's users will be able to delete complex/normal manufacturing orders.
